dmca.title: [TP-C160717P] Copyright and Legal Violation Notice
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page
www.escorts.sexcia.com/escorts/post_10109.html any of the material that
you claim is being infringed as of 1:36:16 p.m. (GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Posted At: Friday, July 14, 2006 10:16 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [TP-C160717P] Copyright and Legal Violation Notice
Subject: [TP-C160717P] Copyright and Legal Violation Notice


From: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [TP-C160717P] Copyright and Legal Violation Notice
Reference: [TP-C160717P]

For your review. 

Thank you, 

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Mr. Peter Pathos, 
 
According to the ARIN database, your company is hosting a site by the
name of http://www.escorts.sexcia.com.  This site is currently illegally
displaying an unauthorized advertisment and photo of my wife.  This
violates US Copyright law and the ad itself is a violation for the
solicitation for prositution in most US States.  The URL for the illegal
add is: 
http://www.escorts.sexcia.com/escorts/post_10109.html at the IP address
of 70.85.116.245.  The administrative contact listed on the site is not
operational and the owner of the site has not responded to a demand
notice to have the ad removed. 
 
This is a demand notice that your company take steps to have the ad
removed or to suspend the site unless or until the ad is removed.  If
this ad continues to appear online within 72 hours, I shall have no
alternative but to take legal action against the owner of the site and
you, his hosting company.  This will include the filing of complanints
and seeking immediate relief with the Attorney Generals of all states
for which this site houses ads for the illegal solicitation of
prostitution.  Please take this matter seriously and act forthwith. 
 
Martin
